RegexPattern.label: Regex Pattern
RegexPattern.tooltip: Regular expression to filter components to copy

CopyTransform.label: Copy Transform Values
CopyTransform.tooltip: Copy position, rotation, and scale when Transform component matches

RemoveExisting.label: Remove Existing Components
RemoveExisting.tooltip: Remove components of the same type from destination before pasting

CreateMissing.label: Create Missing Objects
CreateMissing.tooltip: Automatically create objects that exist in source but not in destination

MatchedOnly.label: Matched Only
MatchedOnly.tooltip: Only create objects that have matched components

ClothNNS.label: Cloth NNS (Nearest Neighbor)
ClothNNS.tooltip: Copy Constraints from the nearest vertex when mesh vertex counts differ

ShowReport.label: Show Report After Paste
ShowReport.tooltip: Display a report of changes after paste operation

NameMappingRules.label: Name Mapping Rules
NameMappingRules.tooltip: Rules to match objects with different names between source and destination

AddRegex.label: + Regex
AddRegex.tooltip: Add a regex-based name transformation rule

AddHumanoidBone.label: + Humanoid Bone
AddHumanoidBone.tooltip: Add a matching rule using Humanoid rig mapping

DebugExport.label: Debug Export
DebugExport.tooltip: Export debug information for bug reports

NotesContent.label:
When using "Nearest Neighbor Search", add a Cloth component to the destination beforehand, or first copy without the option checked, then copy Cloth separately with the option enabled.
(This is due to vertex coordinate issues during Unity Cloth component initialization and is currently difficult to fix)

NoRulesInfo.label:
No replacement rules configured.
Without rules, only exact name matches will work.

HumanoidWarning_CopyFirst.label:
Humanoid Bone rules are set.
Please Copy first before Paste.

HumanoidWarning_NeitherHumanoid.label:
Neither source nor destination is Humanoid.
Humanoid Bone rules will not work.

HumanoidWarning_SrcNotHumanoid.label:
Source is not Humanoid.
Humanoid Bone rules will not work.

HumanoidWarning_DstNotHumanoid.label:
Destination is not Humanoid.
Humanoid Bone rules will not work.
